testcase.name: Invalid Login
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Login Page.............................................passed When User enters the invalid username and password..........................passed Then User will get the error message error message..........................passed

testcase.name: Valid Login
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Login Page.............................................passed When user enters the valid username and password............................passed Then User will be redirected to the Home Page of OrangeHRM..................passed

testcase.name: Access Directory Page and Search for Employee
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Login Page.............................................passed When User enters the valid username and password............................passed Then User will be redirected to the Home Page of OrangeHRM..................passed Then User will click to the directory button................................passed When User enters "O" in the search bar......................................passed And User selects a Job Title from the dropdown list.........................passed And User selects a Location from the dropdown options.......................passed Then User initiates the search..............................................passed And User selects a record...................................................passed Then User resets the search.................................................passed
